fullplot: A young Hollywood executive becomes the assistant to a big time movie producer who is the worst boss imaginable: abusive, abrasive and cruel. But soon things turn around when the young executive kidnaps his boss and visits all the cruelties back on him.
plot: A young, naive Hollywood studio assistant finally turns the tables on his incredibly abusive producer boss.
title: Swimming with Sharks

tomatoes.consensus: Swimming With Sharks is a smart, merciless Hollywood satire that's darkly hilarious and observant, thanks to Kevin Spacey's performance as ruthless studio mogul Buddy Ackerman.
